about.introContent: The Speech and Machine Intelligence Laboratory (SMIL) is dedicated to research in speech signal processing, natural language understanding, and deep learning models. Combining academic theory with practical applications, we explore the infinite possibilities of AI in human-computer interaction and multimedia information analysis.
about.joinContent: We welcome individuals interested in speech processing, AI model training, and applications. Prospective students: please remember to email the professor to schedule an interview first! You are also strongly encouraged to stop by the lab, chat with current students, and experience the lab atmosphere firsthand.
about.expectContent1: You only live once; treat every day as if it were your last.
about.expectContent2: Solidify your domain knowledge and establish your own irreplaceability.
about.expectContent3: Absorb existing theories, but have the courage to pioneer and try new possibilities.
about.expectContent4: A new position requires a new mindset.
about.historyContent: SMIL was co-founded by the advisor and a group of students passionate about digital communication and information technology. We have gradually developed interdisciplinary research themes covering social platforms, online public opinion, speech, and multimedia information processing. Collaborating with research teams both within and outside the university, we participate in various projects to continuously accumulate research results and practical experience.

contents.title: Speech Signal Processing
contents.description: Covering core technologies such as speech recognition, speaker identification, and spoken assessment.

subtitles.label: Large Vocabulary Continuous Speech Recognition (LVCSR)
subtitles.content: Developing high-performance decoders and acoustic models tailored for natural speech with large vocabularies, addressing challenges such as co-articulation, tone variation, and noise interference.
subtitles.application: Smart voice assistants, automated meeting transcription, real-time captioning.

subtitles.label: Keyword Spotting and Word Recognition
subtitles.content: Accurately detecting specific wake-words or key commands in continuous speech streams, emphasizing low-latency and noise-robust model designs.
subtitles.application: Wake-word detection, voice command control.

subtitles.label: Discriminative Acoustic Feature Extraction
subtitles.content: Utilizing deep neural networks to extract highly discriminative speech feature vectors to improve backend model recognition rates in complex environments.
subtitles.application: Robust speech recognition front-end processing.

subtitles.label: Supervised/Unsupervised Acoustic and Language Modeling
subtitles.content: Exploring supervised and unsupervised learning methods to optimize acoustic models for sound modeling and language models for semantic prediction.
subtitles.application: Low-resource language recognition, domain-adaptive model training.

subtitles.label: Contextual Biasing
subtitles.content: Dynamically adjusting recognition weights using dialogue contexts or external knowledge bases to improve accuracy for domain-specific terminology or proper names.
subtitles.application: Personalized contact recognition, professional domain voice input.

subtitles.label: Utterance Verification and Confidence Measure
subtitles.content: Assessing the reliability of speech recognition results and filtering out non-target speech or background noise to ensure system response accuracy.
subtitles.application: Dialogue system error rejection mechanisms, Computer-Assisted Language Learning (CALL).

subtitles.label: Speaker Adaptation
subtitles.content: Fine-tuning general models with small amounts of speaker data to quickly adapt to specific user accents and speaking characteristics.
subtitles.application: Personalized voice assistants.

subtitles.label: Spoken Dialogue Systems
subtitles.content: Integrating speech recognition, semantic understanding, and dialogue management to achieve fluent and goal-oriented human-machine interaction.
subtitles.application: Smart customer service bots, in-car voice systems.

subtitles.label: Automated Speaking / Pronunciation Assessment
subtitles.content: Applying speech signal processing techniques to automatically evaluate and diagnose pronunciation accuracy, fluency, and prosody.
subtitles.application: Computer-Assisted Language Learning (CALL), automated speaking proficiency tests.

contents.title: Information Retrieval
contents.description: Focusing on technologies to accurately extract information from massive text and speech data.

subtitles.label: Retrieval Modeling and Query Formulation
subtitles.content: Researching probabilistic and vector space models, enhancing retrieval relevance through query expansion and rewriting techniques.
subtitles.application: Search engine optimization (SEO), intelligent QA systems.

subtitles.label: Document Representation and Robust Audio Indexing
subtitles.en_label: Document Representation and Robust Audio Indexing
subtitles.content: Converting spoken content into retrievable index structures, overcoming the impact of speech recognition errors on retrieval performance.
subtitles.application: Spoken Document Retrieval (SDR), Podcast search.

subtitles.label: Multilingual Information Retrieval
subtitles.content: Bridging language barriers to allow users to query foreign language documents using their native language.
subtitles.application: Cross-border patent search, multilingual news aggregation.

subtitles.label: Speech-based Multimedia Information Retrieval
subtitles.content: Combining speech, text, and visual features to perform deep semantic retrieval on audio-visual content.
subtitles.application: Video search platforms, audio-visual database management.

subtitles.label: Keyword/Topic-word Extraction
subtitles.content: Automatically analyzing documents or spoken content to extract the most representative keywords and latent topics.
subtitles.application: Automatic tag generation, trend analysis.

subtitles.label: Document Segmentation, Classification and Clustering
subtitles.content: Performing automated structural analysis, categorization, and clustering on massive collections of documents.
subtitles.application: Automatic news categorization, email filtering.

contents.title: Natural Language Processing
contents.description: Researching technologies for computers to understand, generate, and process human language.

subtitles.label: POS Tagging, Syntactic/Semantic Parsing
subtitles.content: Analyzing grammatical structures and deep semantic logic of sentences, serving as the foundation for high-level NLP applications.
subtitles.application: Semantic understanding engines, sentiment analysis.

subtitles.label: Speech Summarization
subtitles.content: Integrating heterogeneous information sources to condense lengthy speech or meeting records into concise summaries.
subtitles.application: Automatic meeting summarization, news digest generation.

subtitles.label: Machine Translation
subtitles.content: Utilizing neural network sequence generation techniques to achieve high-quality automated language translation.
subtitles.application: Real-time speech translators, cross-language communication tools.

subtitles.label: Intelligent Input and Title Generation
subtitles.content: Combining language models to predict user intent and automatically generating engaging titles for articles.
subtitles.application: Intelligent input methods (IMEs), content management systems.

subtitles.label: Automated Essay Scoring
subtitles.content: Automatically grading essays by comprehensively considering vocabulary richness, grammatical correctness, and organizational structure.
subtitles.application: Large-scale writing test grading, writing tutoring systems.

contents.title: Artificial Intelligence & Neural Networks
contents.description: Exploring cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and knowledge representations.

subtitles.label: Search Algorithms and Machine Learning Techniques
subtitles.en_label: Search Algorithms and Machine Learning Techniques
subtitles.content: Researching high-performance search strategies and novel machine learning architectures to solve complex optimization problems.
subtitles.application: Recommendation systems, path planning.

subtitles.label: Semantic and Knowledge Representations
subtitles.content: Transforming human knowledge into machine-understandable structured forms, such as knowledge graphs and vector representations.
subtitles.application: Knowledge-based QA systems, inference engines.
